abstract: The expected range of dates for shipping or picking up an item.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this object to set the expected date range for shipping a package, or the time an item is available for pickup. The payment sheet displays the range as part of the shipping method on the main sheet. When assembling the date components, provide absolute dates to represent the range.

The example code below shows setting a two day time range for shipping a package that starts three days from today:

items.description: A short description of the shipping method.
items.name: label

items.description: Additional description of the shipping method.
items.name: detail

items.description: A client-defined value used to identify this shipping method.
items.name: identifier

items.description: The nonnegative cost associated with this shipping method.
items.name: amount

items.description: A dictionary that specifies the start and end dates for a range of time.
items.name: ApplePayDateComponentsRange

title: dateComponentsRange
